code:
sequenceDiagram participant Network as Network participant Node0 as Node 0 participant Node1 as Node 1 participant Noden as Node n Note over Network: Initialize with n nodes sharing the same blockchain Network->>Network: generate_random_transactions(Infra_IngressController) Note over Network,Noden: Consensus Round Begins %% Block Creation Phase Network->>+Node0: create_candidate_block(Infra_IngressController) Network->>+Node1: create_candidate_block(Infra_RedisCache) Network->>+Noden: create_candidate_block(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note over Node0: Generate quantum nonce using
generate_verifiable_nonce(Infra_IngressController) Note over Node1: Generate quantum nonce using
generate_verifiable_nonce(Infra_IngressController) Note over Noden: Generate quantum nonce using
generate_verifiable_nonce(Infra_RedisCache) Node0-->>-Network: candidate block Node1-->>-Network: candidate block Noden-->>-Network: candidate block %% Quantum State Preparation Phase Network->>+Node0: prepare_quantum_state(Infra_WorkerNode) Network->>+Node1: prepare_quantum_state(Infra_EtcdCluster) Network->>+Noden: prepare_quantum_state(Infra_IngressController) Note over Node0: Create statevector using
create_block_quantum_state(Infra_IngressController) Note over Node1: Create statevector using
create_block_quantum_state(Infra_LoadBalancer) Note over Noden: Create statevector using
create_block_quantum_state(Infra_WorkerNode) Node0-->>-Network: quantum statevector 0 Node1-->>-Network: quantum statevector 1 Noden-->>-Network: quantum statevector n %% Consensus Phase Network->>+Node0: perform_consensus_round(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note over Node0: Calculate fidelities between all states
using calculate_fidelity(Infra_IngressController) Note over Node0: Determine agreement sets based on
fidelity threshold Note over Node0: Select winner based on agreement set size Node0-->>-Network: winner_node_id %% Block Distribution Phase Note over Network: Get winning block from winner node Network->>Network: Add winning block to network blockchain Network->>+Node0: receive_block(Infra_RedisCache) Network->>+Node1: receive_block(Infra_LoadBalancer) Network->>+Noden: receive_block(Infra_IngressController) Node0-->>-Network: update success Node1-->>-Network: update success Noden-->>-Network: update success Note over Network: Verify blockchain consistency across nodes Note over Network,Noden: Consensus Round Complete
